properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.org
properties.description: Organization name to authenticate with (default to user's default).

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.password
properties.description: Password for user to authenticate and obtain token.

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.space
properties.description: Space name to authenticate with (default to user's default).

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.url
properties.description: URL of Cloud Foundry API (Cloud Controller).

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.username
properties.description: Username to authenticate (usually an email address).
